content.body: I find it annoying when I am trying to run check that something isn't an instanceof. For example, I would have to wrap the condition in an extra set of brackets `if (!(value instanceof Class))` as `if (!value instanceof Class)` changes `value` to a boolean before the instanceof check which makes the statement effectively `if (false instanceof
Class)`. It would be nice we we could use syntax like `if !(value instanceof Class)` for the comparison. It's a small nitpick but would be appreciated.
puppy0cam: you could do === false instead
